name: Pretty Girls Klondike Solitaire PLUS
description:
"Pretty Girls Klondike Solitaire" the game of solitaire with Klondike Rules, has been powered up!
Play solitaire against 11 beautiful girls, from cool beauties to tsundere ladies!
Win the game to collect costumes and dress them up in various outfits!

◆The Card Game "Solitaire"

This is one of the card games of solitaire with Klondike rules.
Align and move the cards in the field so that their numbers and colors alternate. Clear the stage if you can align all the cards in order!

◆A tutorial where you can learn the Klondike rules!

If this is your first time playing "Solitaire" with Klondike Rules, don't worry.
A tutorial has been implemented to explain in detail how to play the game and the rules!

◆The number of deck draws can be changed!

You can choose either 1 or 3 deck draw cards.
The difficulty level can be adjusted as desired according to the user's skill level!

◆A full range of hint functions to strongly support the player's strategy!

Shuffle, undo, and other powerful help functions are available to assist you in your strategy.
The hint function will support you when you are in trouble!

◆Challenge 11 girls!

A total of 11 beautiful girl characters will appear in the game!
In the "Hard" game difficulty level, you will gradually change into new costumes as you get closer to clearing the stage.
New costumes can be changed in the dressing room.
All characters are voiced in Japanese.

◆Freely create your own snapshots in the dressing room!

In Diorama mode, you can place multiple characters at the same time, change the placement of each character, their expressions and costumes, and save/load the scenes you have created.
Stamps with hearts and other patterns have been added to allow you to decorate scenes.
Create your ideal scene and make snapshots!

◆Characters


  • Sakura
    The daughter of the Jounouchi family, a large conglomerate. She has a bright and friendly personality with the grace of a celebrity. She plays the role of a maid-maker among her close female friends.
  • Kyoko
    Daughter of the Sakakibara family, a newly established conglomerate. She is cool and a perfectionist. She is proud and will not accept a weak man. She enjoys horseback riding as a hobby for the upper class.
  • Arisu
    The daughter of the Reizeiin family, a family with a long and prestigious history. She is a beautiful woman with a ladylike yet gorgeous atmosphere that is characteristic of super-celebrities.
  • Marika
    The daughter of the wealthy Hosho family. She is a popular model with unparalleled beauty. She is proud and has a tsundere personality.
  • Shizuka
    A bewitching older sister type. As a beautiful older sister, she is the object of longing and infatuation for the men who know her.
  • Madoka
    Madoka was once a mischievous and beautiful yankee. She is a serious person and hates crookedness. She is single-mindedly devoted to the man she falls in love with.
  • Ayame
    She is the daughter-in-law of the heir to the famous Fujishima family, and is held in awe by all concerned for her ability to manage the Fujishima family.
  • Ritsuko
    The only daughter of the famous Fujishima family. She is a taciturn, cool, beautiful girl who is trained in Kyudo (Japanese archery) and adheres to the spirit of Bushido (the way of the samurai). She is respected by everyone around her, both older and younger.
  • Megumi
    She is a neat young lady who married into the famous Asano family from a good family. She is friendly, but she is not accustomed to the world and can be perceived as shy.
  • Shion
    The daughter of the famous Arisugawa family. She has a soft demeanor and a quiet personality. She is considered by those around her to be a beauty because of her personality and good looks.
  • Maya
    The daughter of the Jinguji family. She has a neat and clean appearance and a dignified personality. She has a strong sense of duty and a reasonable personality, but at the same time, she is a very competitive person.

※All characters in this game are officially licensed.
※All characters in this game are over 18 years old.
